summary: ADVISED BY DEALER THIS COMPONET, THOUGH SUBJECT TO MANUFACTURER'S RECALL FOR IDENTICAL FAILURE WAS NOT ON MY VIN.  I MAINTAIN IT WAS A DESIGN DEFECT THAT SHOULD BE REPAIRED/REPLACED BY THE MANUFACTURER. WITHOUT THE INDICATOR IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO KNOW WHICH POSITION YOU ARE IN.  IN ADDITION, THERE IS A HAZARD IN THE MODE OF THE FAILURE CAUSING BINDING IN THE SHIFT LEVER, PREVENTING SOME POSITIONS FROM BEING ENGAGED. *AK         *JB    *DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS*765858
